options.travelerscompass.hud.not_selecte: None of the search modes is selected
options.travelerscompass.hud.settings.0: Widget that displays information about compass status
options.travelerscompass.hud.settings.1: Will be displayed as long as the compass is in your hand
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.align: Adjusts the HUD position relative to the sides.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.block_s: §7The compass will search for Blocks within a certain radius. Larger values may cause lags.
§7▶Searches for anything that can be placed in the world.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.chat.2: Whether compass status information will be displayed when chat is open.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.contain: §7The compass will search for Containers within a certain radius. Larger values may cause lags.
§7▶Searches anything that might have content inside.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.disable: This function is disabled in the config
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.drops.i: §7▶Searches for creatures based on the contents of their lootpool. It will not search for things that are not in their lootpool(such as a trident from a drowned or an Dragon Egg from a dragon).
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.empty_m: It won't search for anything unless you put something in its inventory
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.enough_: Compass works and at the price of your Experience
It absorbs %s units of experience every %s seconds
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.entity_: §7The compass will search for Entities within a certain radius.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.favorit: Will be searched first, even if it is further away than other search targets.
§7▶Searches fluid blocks based on their buckets.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.full_re: §7Completely restores All compass settings to default values.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.info_bu: §7▶§fThe compass will search for items and blocks in the inventory based on the selected search mode.
§7▶§fIt scans the search area every %s seconds and will point to the nearest target.
§7▶§fShift + Click on the compass inventory slot to mark it as a priority.
§7▶§fYou can mark an inventory slot of the compass as a priority (Shift + Click). Objects in these slots will be searched for first, even if they are farther away than non-priority ones.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.item.in: This compass can search for blocks, entities (by their spawn egg, drop or the contents of their inventory), villagers (by their goods), spawners, liquids (by their buckets), items lying on the ground and containers (chest-like blocks by their contents).
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.item_en: §7▶Searches for items lying in the world.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.label_b: §7Toggles the display of an icon indicating whether the compass search target is below or above you.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.mobs.in: §7▶Searches mobs based on their spawn eggs.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.mobs_dr: Search for entities based on their drops
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.mobs_in: §7▶Searches entities (including players) based on the contents of their inventory.
§7▶All items in a Minecart with Chest are considered during the search.
§7▶All items in mob's inventories are considered.
§7▶All items in player's inventories are considered.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.not_eno: It won't search for anything unless you have enough experience
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.not_sel: None of the Search Modes is selected
Select one of the search modes to make the compass work
§7▶Hold Ctrl to make more substantial changes value.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.paused_: §7It won't search for anything while it's on pause
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.priorit: §7The compass will search for favorite targets first.
§7The compass will look for all targets depending on the player's distance from it.
§7To mark an item as a favorite use Shift + Click on the compass inventory slot.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.reset.2: Restores all HUD settings to default.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.shift.b: Shift + Right click to search this block
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.shift.e: Shift + Right click to search this entity
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.sound_s: §7Switches the sound cue indicating that the search target has been found.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.spawner: §7▶Searches spawners based on their spawn eggs.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.village: §7▶Any items accepted by the villager as payment.
§7▶Any items currently being sold by a villager.
options.travelerscompass.tooltip.wide_se: §7Scans the surrounding area once depending on the selected search mode with a bigger search radius
§7The Wide Search function will search for objects within a certain radius. Larger values may cause lags
